import React from 'react' import './style.css' import { useReducer } from 'react' const ACTIONS = { ADD_DIGIT:'add -digit', CHOOSE_OPERATION: 'choose-operation', CLEAR: 'clear', } function reducer (state, {type, payload}){ } const App = () => { const [{currentOperand,previousOperand,operation}, dispatch ]= useReducer(reducer, {}) return (
{previousOperand}{operation}
{currentOperand}
) } export default App;
